mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_id, nick_name, email, qq_open_id, qq_avatar, password, join_time, last_login_time, status, use_space, total_space) values (#{userId},#{nickName},#{email},#{qqOpenId},#{qqAvatar},#{password},#{joinTime},#{lastLoginTime},#{status},#{useSpace},#{totalSpace})
mapper.update: update user_info set nick_name=#{userInfo.nickName}, email=#{userInfo.email}, qq_open_id=#{userInfo.qqOpenId}, qq_avatar=#{userInfo.qqAvatar}, password=#{userInfo.password}, join_time=#{userInfo.joinTime}, last_login_time=#{userInfo.lastLoginTime}, status=#{userInfo.status}, use_space=#{userInfo.useSpace}, total_space=#{userInfo.totalSpace} where user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select user_id, nick_name, email, qq_open_id, qq_avatar, password, join_time, last_login_time, status, use_space, total_space from user_info where email = #{email};
